alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; Lower Washington County; San Rafael Swell; South Central Utah; Upper Sevier River Valleys; Western Canyonlands; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 3:12PM MST until February 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches possible with locally higher amounts lower Washington County, 6 to 12 inches most other valleys in the watch area. * WHERE...Portions of central, southern and southwest Utah. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions will be possible across the entire watch area. Snow may accumulate in areas not typically impacted by heavy snow including the lower valleys of southern and eastern Utah.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
